last_episode_to_air.name: Like Flowers in Sand
last_episode_to_air.overview: With Mi-ran in danger, Yu-gyeong races to save her. Baek-du gives it his all in the tournament — hoping a win will secure a spot in Yu-gyeong's heart.

name: Like Flowers in Sand
overview: Struggling to find success, a former wrestling prodigy finds himself ready to quit until he reencounters an old friend who reignites his passion.

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview:
Kim Baek Doo participates in the traditional Korean wrestling sport of ssireum and is a member of the ssireum team for the Geosan County Office. Baek Doo was born as the youngest son of a prestigious ssireum family. In the past, he was known as a genius like ssireum wrestler, but not anymore. He is thinking about retiring from the sport altogether. One day, Baek Doo meets his childhood friend Oh Yoo Kyung and has a turning point in his ssireum life. Yoo Kyung and Baek Doo grew up together in Geosan County. She begins to work as a leader of the management team for the ssireum team, which is on the verge of disbanding.

Meanwhile, they have people around them like Min Hyun Wook, who suddenly appears at Geosan County and adjusts well to life here, and Joo Mi Ran, who is a mysterious cafe owner. There's also the new coach, Kwak Jin Soo, of the ssireum team and Cho Seok Hee, who is Baek Doo’s best friend and works as a police constable.

episodes.name: Ssireum Prodigy, Kim Baek-du
episodes.overview: Feeling despondent about his footing in the ssireum world, Kim Baek-du competes in a new tournament — coming up against a formidable opponent.

episodes.name: There's Something About Oh Du-sik
episodes.overview: Baek-du encounters an old friend who persistently denies knowing him. But he later sees her become the manager of his team and deduces her identity.

episodes.name: Du-sik Is Not Her Name
episodes.overview: No longer a wrestler, Baek-du contemplates other career paths. After the coach suddenly quits the team, Oh Yu-gyeong tries to get to the bottom of it.

episodes.name: I Know What You Did That Day
episodes.overview: Kwak Jin-su challenges Baek-du to a ssireum match for the role of coach. But the match is interrupted when the police take Baek-du away for questioning.

episodes.name: Kim Baek-du, I See Right Through You
episodes.overview: After finding out Yu-gyeong's ruse, Baek-du rejoins the ssireum team.They later pay a visit to Lim Dong-seok to investigate the former coach.

episodes.name: What Cannot Be Hidden
episodes.overview: Amid the ongoing investigation, Baek-du trains for an upcoming match. But when Jin-su suddenly sidelines Baek-du, Yu-gyeong stands up for him.

episodes.name: New Day, New Incident
episodes.overview: Baek-du experiences several roadblocks as he tries to make his upcoming competition — and during his matches, he can't stop thinking about Yu-gyeong.

episodes.name: Remember, Don't Remember
episodes.overview: After 20 years, Yu-gyeong meets with Joo Mi-ran to talk through unsolved business. While drunkenly catching up with Yu-gyeong, Baek-du makes a move.

episodes.name: All That We Have Lost
episodes.overview: Ready to share more information, Mi-ran pays a visit to Yu-gyeong and Baek-du. Rumors of a scandal between Yu-gyeong and Baek-du circulate around town.

episodes.name: Endlessly Tangled, Persistently Intertwined
episodes.overview: Baek-du awaits Yu-gyeong's response after a momentous confession. Meanwhile, several old friends begin to figure out Yu-gyeong's true identity.

episodes.name: The Culprit Lives Among Us
episodes.overview: Old friends join forces to find the culprit hiding in their town. But when they hit a standstill, Mi-ran sets herself up as bait — much to her risk.

episodes.name: Like Flowers in Sand
episodes.overview: With Mi-ran in danger, Yu-gyeong races to save her. Baek-du gives it his all in the tournament — hoping a win will secure a spot in Yu-gyeong's heart.
